title: Vigilante

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose to take justice in your own hands and shoot someone at night. (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you shoot another Town member you will be hanged by the Town Hangman. (killed at the start of the next day)
- You cannot shoot Night 1.

desc:

*I'm not sure why the attack value isn't reflected in the.. you know, attack section.*
